meanings.definition: Belonging or relating separately to each of two or more people or things.
meanings.sent1: In their respective rooms, the siblings enjoyed their own space.
meanings.sent2: The students handed in their respective assignments to the teacher.
meanings.sent3: The cats decided to nap in their respective favorite spots.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed in their respective colors, creating a beautiful garden.
meanings.sent5: Each player wore their respective team jerseys to the match.

meanings.definition: In the order given or mentioned.
meanings.sent1: They arrived at the party respective to their invitations.
meanings.sent2: The guests sat down at the table respective to their names on the seating chart.
meanings.sent3: The students lined up for the race respective to their numbers.
meanings.sent4: The books on the shelf were arranged respective to their genres.
meanings.sent5: The cars parked in the lot respective to their arrival times.
